name: Halloween '99
description:
Halloween ‘99 is a trick-or-treating adventure through a small town. Dress up, explore, and get candy! 

I had an absolute blast making Halloween '99. My goal was to make a game focused on the overall experience and vibes rather than mechanics. I want the player to feel just like a kid trick-or-treating to bring back nostalgic memories and create new ones for those who never did it growing up. Thanks for playing, and enjoy!

Song by Tritnew: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1046932
